data.name: Indy Pro '22: Rebirth of the Territories
data.detailed_description:
Currently in Phase 1 playtesting Development/Alpha builds. This playtest ensures the game loads and that the UI layout holds across multiple installs. Join our discord https://discord.gg/VVCXj7c3jx to fully participate in playtesting.


Indy Pro '22: Rebirth of the Territories is a pro wrestling booking simulator based on the real world of independent professional wrestling.

In a world where the top promotions have collapsed, take control of an independent wrestling promotion and book your way to the top of a new territory system that has replaced the mega feds.

Features
  • Featuring IWTV and the IWTV World Title as the territory title!
  • Over 150 real independent wrestling promotions!
  • Over 1500 real independent wrestlers, referees, announcers, managers, valets, and more!
  • Play as the Booker or the Owner of the federation of choice.
  • Compete against all the other promotions that are being controlled by the AI.
  • Pre-book months in advance using the calendaring system.
  • Manage the day-to-day aspects of an independent wrestling federation just like the real promoters.
  • Manipulate ticket prices, concessions, merchandise prices, and quality, and much more!
  • Upgrade your promotion to increase match quality and safety.
  • Steam Achievements!
